Keywords: Codex , Frightful Four , Maximum Carnage , Monster
Real Name: Cletus Kasady
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
SYMBIOTE: Plasticity, Shape Change.
MAXIMUM CARNAGE: Once per turn when Carnage hits, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to up to 2 opposing characters that weren't hit but are adjacent to a hit character.

September 5, 2020
Brunner412
Personally I'd give him the Soul Gem over the Carnage Symbiote to give him some kind of healing ability. I do like this Carnage. He's not perfect and not really flavorful but he's good. Indom. 7 clix of health. 75 pts and double roll outs up top. As being my favorite character I'm happy with this being a low key representation of the character. If I want to play him as a beast I'll grab the Absolute Carnage super rare.
September 3, 2020
ArkhamInquirer
How are we feeling about this Carnage versus the Superior Foes one? For 25 points less, you get better values, Indom, slightly longer dial, and that nifty Maximum Carnage trait. You do lose out on some of the healing potential that Superior Foes Carnage has, but if you're really that fussed about it, you can pay ten points to give this guy the Carnage Symbiote so he heals 1 every time he KO's somebody, and he'll still be fifteen points cheaper than our last Carnage. Still not a perfect Carnage dial (top dial super senses and back dial toughness gives me conniptions) but imo he's better than the last one we got, even though I liked that one.
